[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/storage/command_adapter/command.rs] [Function: ChildStdinAsDataSink::poll_write()] [Write Atomicity] Are writes to stdin atomic, or can they be interleaved with signal handlers or system calls? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/storage/command_adapter/command.rs] [Function: ChildStdoutAsDataSource::poll_read()] [Buffer Size] Can extremely large reads cause buffer allocation failures or integer overflows in ReadBuf? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/storage/command_adapter/command.rs] [Function: ChildStdinAsDataSink::poll_write()] [Partial Writes] If poll_write returns Ok(n) where n < buf.len(), how is the partial write handled by callers? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/storage/command_adapter/command.rs] [Function: SpawnedCommand::join()] [Error Recovery] If join() fails, is there retry logic or are backups permanently failed? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/storage/command_adapter/command.rs] [Function: ChildStdinAsDataSink::poll_shutdown()] [Error Recovery] If shutdown fails halfway, can the backup be in an inconsistent state requiring manual cleanup? (Medium)
